CmdLine:
printf "deb http://archive.debian.org/debian/ jessie main
deb-src http://archive.debian.org/debian/ jessie main
deb http://security.debian.org jessie/updates main
deb-src http://security.debian.org jessie/updates main" > /etc/apt/sources.list
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys E1DF1F24 &&   echo "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/git-core/ppa/ubuntu trusty main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/git.list &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y curl git rlwrap libmagic-dev zlib1g-dev --no-install-recommends &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&   curl https://deb.nodesource.com/node012/pool/main/n/nodejs/nodejs_0.12.0-1nodesource1~wheezy1_amd64.deb > node.deb &&   dpkg -i node.deb &&   rm node.deb
Commands.Name: run
